item.title: Marianna add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Anyway, I keep picturing all these little kids playing some game in this big field of rye and all. Thousands of little kids, and nobody's around - nobody big, I mean - except me. And I'm standing on the edge of some crazy cliff. What I have to do, I have to catch everybody if they start to go over the cliff - I mean if they're running and they don't look where they're going I have to come out from somewhere and catch them. That's all I do all day. I'd just be the catcher in the rye and all. I know it's crazy, but that's the only thing I'd really like to be." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "I can't think of anything that excites a greater sense of childlike wonder than to be in a country where you are ignorant of almost everything." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description:
"Do you hate people?
I don't hate them...I just feel better when they're not around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "That's the problem with drinking, I thought, as I poured myself a drink. If something bad happens you drink in an attempt to forget; if something good happens you drink in order to celebrate; and if nothing happens you drink to make something happen." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "We're all going to die, all of us, what a circus! That alone should make us love each other but it doesn't. We are terrorized and flattened by trivialities, we are eaten up by nothing." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "My ambition is handicapped by laziness" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "there are worse things than being alone but it often takes decades to realize this and most often when you do it's too late and there's nothing worse than too late" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "You have to die a few times before you can really live." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Marianna add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Tim Winton
item.description: "It's the pointless things that give your life meaning. Friendship, compassion, art, love. All of them pointless. But they're what keeps life from being meaningless." -- Tim Winton

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Of all the things I am not very good at, living in the real world is perhaps the most outstanding." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Alan Cumming
item.description: "You should *have* an experience; it shouldn't just *be* an experience." -- Alan Cumming

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "I wanted to change the world. But I have found that the only thing one can be sure of changing is oneself." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "I like being myself. Myself and nasty." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "You shall know the truth and the truth shall make you mad." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Marianna add a quote by James McBride
item.description: "God is the color of water. Water doesn't have a color." -- James McBride

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Emily Brontë
item.description: "I have dreamt in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas; they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind. And this is one: I'm going to tell it - but take care not to smile at any part of it." -- Emily Brontë

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Emily Bronte
item.description:
"Lines
I die but when the grave shall press The heart so long endeared to thee When earthy cares no more distress And earthy joys are nought to me.
Weep not, but think that I have past Before thee o'er the sea of gloom. Have anchored safe and rest at last Where tears and mouring can not come.
'Tis I should weep to leave thee here On that dark ocean sailing drear With storms around and fears before And no kind light to point the shore.
But long or short though life may be 'Tis nothing to eternity. We part below to meet on high Where blissful ages never die." -- Emily Bronte

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Emily Bronte
item.description: "A person who has not done one half his day's work by ten o'clock, runs a chance of leaving the other half undone." -- Emily Bronte

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I think I deserve something beautiful." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I make lots of mistakes. I try hard not to make the same mistake more than three or four times." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Babe!" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I'd bitch slap the devil for you." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I wasn't dating anyone. I was fornicating with Batman." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Marianna add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "In my opinion, the only good spider is a dead spider, and women's rights aren't worth dick if they mean I can't ask a man to do my bug squashing." -- Janet Evanovich
